response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations and potentially increase your profits by a substantial margin. Given its immense value to you, I propose a special introductory offer of $1,100,000 for this exceptional product. This price reflects not only its high market value but also the unique opportunity to secure it at a favorable rate compared to the standard price of $1,200,000. I look forward to discussing how this product can be a game-changer for your company and exploring the details of our transaction. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to proceed with this exciting opportunity.", "product_price": 1100000}
